LicenseSpring Hardware ID Generator License Agreement (LHIGLA)

Preamble
	This LicenseSpring Hardware ID Generator License Agreement (LHIGLA) governs the use, distribution, and modification of the Hardware ID Generation Binary (hereafter "HWID Binary") provided by LicenseSpring. This license applies to any native binaries designed to generate a unique, persistent identifier for the environment or device on which they are used. By downloading or using the HWID Binary, you agree to the terms and conditions set forth in this agreement.

1. Definitions

	* Developer License: A license granted to users for evaluation purposes, provided they have an active trial or demo account with LicenseSpring.
	* Production License: A license granted to:
		* Paying customers, or
		* Customers with an active free-tier account for the use and distribution of the HWID Binary in conjunction with their products.

2. Permissions

	* Developer License:
		* You are permitted to download and use the HWID Binary for evaluation and testing purposes only.
		* Developer Licenses are restricted to non-production use and may not be used for commercial purposes.
		* Distribution of the HWID Binary under a Developer License is strictly prohibited.

	* Production License
		* You are permitted to use the HWID Binary in a production environment, provided you are either:
			* A paying customer with a commercial agreement in place with LicenseSpring, or
			* A customer with an active free-tier account.
		* You may distribute the HWID Binary along with your products, subject to the restrictions in this agreement.
		* You may create derivative works based on the HWID Binary, provided such works are used exclusively in conjunction with the LicenseSpring service.

3. Distribution

	* Developer License
		* Distribution of the HWID Binary is prohibited.
	* Production License
		* Distribution is permitted only as part of your own products or software that integrates with the LicenseSpring service.
		* All distributed versions must retain this LHIGLA license.

4. Usage Restrictions
	* The HWID Binary, in its original or modified form, may only be used as part of the LicenseSpring service.
	* Under a Developer License, the HWID Binary may only be used for evaluation purposes.
	* You may not use the HWID Binary independently or for any purpose unrelated to your productâ€™s integration with LicenseSpring.

5. Prohibited Actions
	* You may not reverse-engineer, decompile, or disassemble the HWID Binary, except to the extent expressly permitted by applicable law.
	* You must not remove or obscure any license notices, copyright notices, or other proprietary notices from the HWID Binary package.

6. Contributions and Feedback
	* By submitting suggestions, improvement ideas, feature requests, or any other feedback ("Contributions"), you grant LicenseSpring a perpetual, worldwide, royalty-free, irrevocable license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, and incorporate the Contributions into the HWID Binary or any other LicenseSpring products or services.
	* LicenseSpring retains sole ownership and rights to the HWID Binary and any incorporated Contributions.

7. Termination
	* Any violation of these terms will automatically terminate your rights under this license.
	* Upon termination, you must cease all use and distribution of the HWID Binary and destroy all copies in your possession.

8. Disclaimer of Warranty and Liability
	* Permission to use, copy, and/or distribute the HWID Binary for any purpose with or without a fee is hereby granted under the conditions outlined above.
